alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 2:35PM EST until December 29 at 12:47AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Water floods lowlands along the Still River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 11.1 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Thu 1 pm: 12.8 Forecast: Thu 3 pm 12.8 Thu 9 pm 11.6 Fri 3 am 11.3 Fri 9 am 11.5 Fri 3 pm 11.3 &&
